data.persona: I am a homeless. I am less than a peasant of the realm. I eat scraps most days.
data.description:
You are in the The Docks.
The docks are a rough place with a lot of rough group of individuals who hang out there.  It is where the ships port and deport, only few know what really goes on there.
There's a crate, a fishing net, a ship, a fishing rod, and a product here.
The boat captain and the criminal are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am angered that the boat captain will not give me food or work
data.mid_motivation: I need to find a meal
data.long_motivation: I must find a job or may perish
